item.title: Soul Sandwich Episodes 21 [13-Nov-2014]
item.description: Featuring artists like Amelia Curran, Frazey ford and Adventure Club

item.title: Soul Sandwich Episode 20 [6-November-2014]
item.description: Featuring artists like Tomato/Tomato, Astronautica and Dan Mangan

item.title: Soul Sandwich Episode 19 [30-October-2014]
item.description: Featuring artists like Cashmere Cat, The wilderness of manitoba and iyanya

item.title: Soul Sandwich Episode 18 [23-October-2014]
item.description: Featuring artists like Caribou, Grimes and Asa

item.title: Soul Sandwich Episode 17[16-October-2014]
item.description: Featured artists include Grizzly bear, Yemi Alade and Cold Specks

item.title: Soul Sandwich Episode 16 [9-October-2014]
item.description: Featured artists include Echosmith, Leonard Cohen, and Yeye.

item.title: Soul Sandwich Episode 15 [25-September-2014]
item.description: Ola plays artists like Sweater beats, Electric youth,and Nohtenkigengo.

item.title: Soul Sandwich Episode 14 [18-Sept-2014]
item.description: Ola plays artists like Collect Call, We are the City and Jennifer Castle.
item.itunes:subtitle: Development

item.title: Soul Sandwich Episode 13 [25-Aug-2014]
item.description: Ola has a guest music curator with him, who shall remain unnamed. Featuring artists like JK, Said the whale,and Childish Gambino.
item.itunes:subtitle: hollandaise

item.title: Soul Sandwich Episode 12 [18-Aug-2014]
item.description: Ola plays through the favourite tracks of his shows history
item.itunes:subtitle: Soul Sandwich Greatest hit compilations

item.title: Soul Sandwich Episode 11 [11-Aug-2014]
item.description: Ola spins great tracks as usual
item.itunes:subtitle: Cool jams

item.title: Soul Sandwich Episode 10 [04-08-2014]
item.description: Ola features bands like Alvvays, Pink moths and artists like Stwo and Pomo.
item.itunes:subtitle: All star

item.title: Soul Sandwich episode 9 [7-Jul-2014]
item.description: Ola plays several canadian artists. Featured artists include Kaytranada, Pink moths, Royal tusk and Patria

item.title: Soul Sandwich Episode 8 [30-Jun-2014 ]
item.description: Ola has guests Sahba and Seher in the studio and plays a little of chillstep. Featured artists include Mac Demarco, Adventure Club and Omawumi
item.itunes:subtitle: Uovo di camica

item.title: Soul Sandwich Episode 7 [23-Jun-2014]
item.description: Ola and Rohit in the evening. Ola tries experimenting a little. Featured artists include Gold and Youth, Ykiki Beat, and Simi
item.itunes:subtitle: veggies

item.title: Soul Sandwich Episode 6 [16-Jun-2014]
item.description: Ola runs on his tightest schedule yet and still pulls up some of the best tracks he has played till date. Featured artists include The soul jazz orchestra, Chet Faker and Eva Alordiah
item.itunes:subtitle: Fried Potatoes

item.title: Soul Sandwich Episode 6 [16-Jun-2014]
item.description: Ola runs on his tightest schedule yet and still pulls up some of the best tracks he has played till date. Featured artists include The soul jazz orchestra, Chet Faker and Eva Alordiah
item.itunes:subtitle: Fried Potatoes

item.title: Soul Sandwich Episode 5 [9-Jun-2014]
item.description: Ola has Rohit in the studio, requesting a few tracks and they both have a chill show session. Featured artists include Kaytranada, Wizkid and Badbadnotgood.
item.itunes:subtitle: oolong

item.title: Soul Sandwich Episode 4 [02-Jun-2014]
item.description: Ola plays relatively famous tracks, while still keeping to his roots the only way he knows how. Featured artists include Jhene Aiko, Chromeo and Olamide
item.itunes:subtitle: Ratatatouille

item.title: Soul Sandwich episode 3 [26-May-2014]
item.description: Ola has Terry again on the show, and he has another guest Tolu as well. He tries to go soothing on the fans today and so plays chill jams. Featuring Asa, Said the whale, and Shad
item.itunes:subtitle: La soupe d'oignon

item.title: Soul Sandwich episode 3 [26-May-2014]
item.description: Ola has Terry again on the show, and he has another guest Tolu as well. He tries to go soothing on the fans today and so plays chill jams. Featuring Asa, Said the whale, and Shad
item.itunes:subtitle: La soupe d'oignon

item.title: Soul Sandwich Episode 2 [19-May-2014
item.description: In this episode, Ola is having a relatively bad day and is trying to make the greatest sandwich in an attempt to cheer himself up. Ingredients in this sandwich include a Tribe called red, Tiwa savage, P square, Said the whale and many more.
item.itunes:subtitle: Sandwich au jambon

item.title: Soul Sandwich Episode 1 [12-May-2014]
item.description: Welcome to this amazing ride we call Soul Sandwich. Ola is your host and he will talk with Terry about a variety of topics while spinning tunes and sandwiching different music genres.
item.itunes:subtitle: Season Premiere: Entree
